cafe

Class DonutController

  • java.lang.Object
    • cafe.DonutController

  • public class DonutController
extends java.lang.Object
    The DonutController class takes care of the DonutView.fxml . The DonutView allows the user to choose their typeOfDonut, flavorOfDonut, and quantity from the comboBox. The DonutView also allows the user to add or remove the donuts the don't want. as adding their items to the order.
    Author:
    Prachiti Atigre, Ujani Patel

    • Method Detail

      • addDonuts

        void addDonuts(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        This method add's the Donut to the listView where the user can see what they currently ordered. The method adds the typeofDonut, flavor and quantity that user chose onto the viewList it also dynamically calculates the total price of the donuts according to donutType on the textArea with the help of the donutClass
        Parameters:
        event - upon selecting donut,flavor and quantity

      • addDonutToOrder

        void addDonutToOrder(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        This method loads the OrderView.fxml so that information from the DonutView can be passed onto the OrderView. It passes the information of donutType, donutFlavor and quantity that the user ordered in the form of observableLisinto the OrderView.
        Parameters:
        event, - upon the event of selecting the add to order button to add the donut Order.

      • initialize

        public void initialize()
        This method creates an observableList of type String to store the donutTyes and Quantity of the Donut from the comboBox so that the user can pick their donutType, flavor and quantity of donut.

      • removeDonuts

        void removeDonuts(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        This method removes Donuts that the user doesn't want anymore. This removes the DonutItem after the user selects the item they want to remove and hit the remove button. This method then calls and calculateItem price and decrements the total cost. The price is updated and dynamically shown on the textArea.
        Parameters:
        event - upon selecting the remove button.

      • setDonutType

        void setDonutType(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        This method sets the type of donut the user chose and implements the flavors of that donutType
        Parameters:
        event - upon selecting a donutType
